attributes.action: change the government's hypocritical policies towards Russia and acknowledge that the recent conflict in Georgia was started by Georgia with US help.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Russian assistance to the South Ossetians was no different to UN/NATO intervention in Bosnia and Kosovo. The UK recently recognised Kosovo's declaration of independence and Russia's recognition of South Ossetia is no different.

With US military on the ground, Georgia, troops started bombing South Ossetian civilians, most of whom are Russian passport holders. While we can only speculate about US involvement and motives and her relations to the US-educated Georgian president, we do not need to speculate on who started this conflict. The UK government is blaming Russia and condemning the Russian government for being aggressors. The US/UK invasion of Iraq seems forgotten.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
